sentences: The final scheduled meeting for the fourth replenishment of the Global Environment Facility (GEF) Trust Fund took place on 21 and 22 November, in Tokyo, Japan.
However, the contributing participants were unable to reach agreement on funding pledges, and it is expected that a further meeting will convene in mid-December.
enb_long_title: Eleventh session of the Conference of the Parties to the Climate Change Convention and first meeting of the Parties to the Kyoto Protocol
